frontMatter.title: SOLID Principles
frontMatter.excerpt: Set of rules each programmer should adhere to in order to make the code more secure, robust and extensible. This is my attempt to make it easier to understand with the help of simple examples.

frontMatter.title: Binary Search
frontMatter.excerpt: In this post we will look at the implementation of the different variations of binary search, which can be used to solve almost all the coding problems around this.
